methods.name: public int getXSLToken()
methods.comment:
* Get an int constant identifying the type of element.
   * @see org.apache.xalan.templates.Constants
   *
   * @return The token ID for this element

methods.name: public String getNodeName()
methods.comment:
* Return the node name.
   *
   * @return The element's name

methods.name: public void execute(TransformerImpl transformer) throws TransformerException
methods.comment:
* Execute the xsl:choose transformation.
   *
   *
   * @param transformer non-null reference to the the current transform-time state.
   *
   * @throws TransformerException

methods.name: public ElemTemplateElement appendChild(ElemTemplateElement newChild)
methods.comment:
* Add a child to the child list.
   *
   * @param newChild Child to add to this node's child list
   *
   * @return The child that was just added to the child list
   *
   * @throws DOMException

methods.name: public boolean canAcceptVariables()
methods.comment:
* Tell if this element can accept variable declarations.
   * @return true if the element can accept and process variable declarations.

methodNames: public void execute(TransformerImpl transformer) throws TransformerException
